name: Longsword
description: A longsword is a versatile and balanced weapon, featuring a straight, double-edged blade that is typically between 33 to 43 inches long, designed for both slashing and thrusting attacks.

name: Shortsword
description: A shortsword is a versatile and lightweight weapon, ideal for quick strikes and agile combat. It features a double-edged blade and a comfortable grip, making it suitable for both slashing and thrusting attacks.

name: Greatsword
description: A greatsword is a large, two-handed sword known for its impressive length and weight, designed for delivering devastating slashes and thrusts in battle.

name: Battleaxe
description: A battleaxe is a versatile weapon with a sharp, heavy blade mounted on a sturdy handle, designed for both slashing and chopping in combat.

name: Greataxe
description: A greataxe is a large, two-handed weapon with a broad, heavy blade designed for delivering devastating slashes and cleaving through armor.

name: Mace
description: A mace is a blunt weapon with a heavy, metal head mounted on a sturdy wooden or metal shaft, designed for delivering powerful and crushing blows in close combat.

name: Spear
description: A spear is a pole weapon consisting of a shaft, usually of wood, with a pointed head. It is designed for thrusting and can be thrown or used in close combat.

name: Dagger
description: A dagger is a small, pointed weapon with a sharp blade, designed for thrusting and stabbing. It is easy to conceal and can be used in close combat or thrown at a distance.

name: Rapier
description: A rapier is a slender, sharply pointed sword designed primarily for thrusting attacks. It is lightweight and allows for quick, precise strikes, making it a favored weapon among duellists.

name: Scimitar
description: A scimitar is a curved, single-edged sword with a sharp blade, designed for slashing attacks. It is favored by many for its balance and speed in combat.

name: Flail
description: A flail is a weapon consisting of a spiked or weighted head attached to a handle by a chain or rope, allowing for powerful, swinging strikes that can bypass shields and armor.

name: Morningstar
description: A morningstar is a spiked weapon that consists of a heavy head attached to a long handle, designed for delivering devastating blows and puncturing armor.

name: Halberd
description: A halberd is a versatile pole weapon that combines an axe blade, a spear point, and a hook, allowing for both slashing and thrusting attacks. It is effective in both close and ranged combat.

name: Club
description: A club is a simple, blunt weapon made from a heavy piece of wood or metal, designed for striking opponents with force. It is easy to wield and effective in close combat.

name: Quarterstaff
description: A quarterstaff is a long wooden staff, typically around six to eight feet in length, used for both offense and defense. It is versatile and can be wielded with one or two hands.

name: Falchion
description: The falchion is a one-edged sword with a curved blade, designed for slashing attacks. It combines the cutting power of an axe with the reach of a sword, making it a favored weapon among warriors.
